alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Eastern Loudoun; Northern Fauquier; Rappahannock; Warren; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 8:09AM EST until February 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with up to 5 inches locally. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northern Maryland and northern and northwest Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest accumulations will be on non- paved surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Eastern Loudoun; Northern Fauquier; Rappahannock; Warren; Western Loudoun
